scripts.setup:
pnpm install
ln -sf "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/apps/web/.env" apps/web/.env
ln -sf "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/apps/backend/.env" apps/backend/.env
ln -sf "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/apps/ai/.env" apps/ai/.env
pnpm bootstrap
scripts.run: CONDUCTOR_WEB_PORT=$CONDUCTOR_PORT CONDUCTOR_BE_PORT=$((CONDUCTOR_PORT+1)) CONDUCTOR_AI_PORT=$((CONDUCTOR_PORT+2)) pnpm run conductor:run
